alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 3:10PM EST until January 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches possible, especially for elevations above 1000 feet. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Berkshire County. In New York, Schoharie County. In Vermont, Bennington and Eastern Windham Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slick conditions on untreated road surfaces and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Valley areas may see snow mixed with rain, reducing snow accumulations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
